alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Reagan; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 7:37PM CDT until May 10 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Glasscock County in western Texas... Reagan County in western Texas... Southeastern Upton County in western Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Greenwood to 25 miles southwest of Garden City to 8 miles south of Rankin, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...A 58 mph wind gust was reported at St. Lawrence. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Lake, Garden City, Reagan County Airport, Best, Saint Lawrence and Stiles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Midland.
